channel.title: Random Slowness
channel.description:
Ok it may be because everything is in one room but... Ok I am working on Lava Burn Island version 2.3 anyways I am using czar because its the only source I know that has working Jagex items on v7 but... When ever I log on the server is COMPLETELY slow I mean I can barely move! It may be because all the shop people and portals and stuff are all in the spawn point area... Can someone tell me why?
btw the last thing I did before it started lagging was add the portals to the spawn room (but they were extremely fast for a while)

item.title: Random Slowness
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

Most Runescape Private Server Client’s Use Alot Of Power, Do Contol Alt Delete And Then You Can GOto Preformace And See If You Need A Better Computer To Run It.

Cpu Usage Is What You Are Looking At.

Read full topic
